channel.title: UX-UI on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in UX-UI on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Product Design Commentary #3: The Art of Prompting in AI-Human Interaction
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The longstanding challenge of communication between humans and machines has been ongoing since the dawn of computing. With the emergence of large language models (LLMs), prompting has become a powerful tool in facilitating this communication.

item.title: Product Design Commentary #2: Unpacking the Sparkles Icon and AI Onboarding Challenges
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: AI Icon - Sparkles Article: https://www.nngroup.com/articles/ai-sparkles-icon-problem/ The Spark icon has become increasingly common today, primarily used for AI-related features. However, the icon carries multiple meanings and is interpreted in various ways, making it ambiguous.

item.title: Product Design Commentary #1: New Technologies Changing UX/UI and Product Design
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As technology evolves, design processes are being transformed by advancements like Voice User Interfaces (VUI), Augmented Reality (AR), Virtual Reality (VR), Modular Design Systems, and AI tools.

item.title: Designing for Forgiveness: Creating Error-Tolerant Interfaces
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In the world of digital products, ensuring that users have a smooth experience is crucial. One key part of this is designing interfaces that can handle user mistakes.

item.title: Low-fidelity prototype: UI Design
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Research 1. Understand prospect Understanding stakeholder, company, business model, goals and challenges of the product in order to set mindset, define style, color palette, and typography, iconography, illustration, and photography.

item.title: UX
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: UX Research Framework 1. Gather Data In the first phase, we focus on gathering as much valuable data as humanly possible.

item.title: Error Messaging
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What makes a bad error message Inappropriate tone Technical jargon Passing the blame Generic for no reason What make a good error message

item.title: AirWatt: Apply AI/ML for IoT electricity usage solutions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief AirWatt is an IoT solution that integrates and monitors electricity usage using AI/ML. AirWatt’s vision is to help businesses track electric usage status of electrical equipment.

item.title: Dental Marketplace: Digitalize the Singapore dentistry operation process
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded by Desmond Goh - a Singaporean dental surgeon, Dental Marketplace is an online platform for dental professionals to stay active in dentistry and simplify operation process.

item.title: BHD Cinema: Redesign BHD's booking ticket app
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction BHD is one of the biggest cinema chains in Vietnam with hundreds of thousands tickets sold monthly. However, its mobile application is a complete drawback; users cannot book tickets online, it feels and looks outdated, inconsistent and cluttered.
